text: Hanyiri kongansutu kwiwi penguinat� üu yangʻull 360 Fal sufficiently the use, we have a seedbed. What is the seedbed? A seedbed is piece of land where plant are growing where plants are planted are raw maturity and harvested on the same piece of land. What is the Naz says? A Naz says is a piece of land Haji ka traitori himo hibiru yazwapwama. So mwen mari mahtoi mahtoi ya. Tuwa mahto ni m populikoa hibiru yazwapwama kakakakakakaka nila. This is a special type of nursery bed for raising uh where the over grown seedling big seedling from their main nursery are transplanted are removed and grown there before the type of transplanting is attained. katibun. Belika uibwani weiqia niha rea kwa maaziwa baka kuwa kaseria kamaera seiza kwa maazun kwa haza uiwa kwa maazun kwa maazun kwa maazun kwa maazuni kwa maazun kwa maazuni kwa maazuni kwa maazuni We go to the types of nursery beds, the first one we have vegetable nursery bed you can see it there, it is used for raising seedlings for vegetables, for example you can have the one for tomatoes, you can have the one for cabbage, the one for kale and so on. kwa waja nisa nisaribe? Namani, nisaribe isomu mwaza, 2. Nisaribe kwa watu mwaza Weeka kwa mwaza wa kajimu mwosa kwa mwaza mwazu kwa mwaza mwaza kwa mwaza waza nisaribe 2. For example you can have a shed that will provide the shed to the seedlings below the shed so that you can reduce the rate of transpiration and by reducing the rate of transpiration meaning that the seedlings will continue growing in a good manner. Then we will go to the next one that is the facility, it facilitate anasriben, facilitate selection and transplanting of only the healthy and vigoras growing seedlings giving them a good head start. It means that those big seedlings which are on the anasriben they are uprooted, they are transplanted to the main seed bed while the other which are young they are left there to continue with growth. Then enables the raising of many seedlings in a given area. Anasriben is the one which is normally carry a lot of seedlings in a per unit area meaning that you can there is no there is no competition for nutrients because you can provide adequately for the nutrients to the soil. Then we have it allows other land operation to go on in the main seed bed while the crop is growing in the anasriben. Therefore you can continue cultivating the other crops as you wait for the seedling to grow before the time of transplanting is reached. Then that's marks the end of today's lesson and I will give you assignment the first question differentiate between seed bed and seedling bed. And the second one give three uses of seed bed shed constructed above anasriben. You give three uses of a shed constructed above anasriben.
